first.name: Palmerston
first.content: Hey,| my name is Palmerston. @Nice to meet you.

1.content: I’d love to hang out,@but I’m up to my ears in a dangerous and intriguing plot.

3.content: ||...A plot which you have no business getting your pixels wrapped up in.

fire_on.name: Palmerston
fire_on.content: …What?|@You’re still here?@Thanks for getting that fire started.

4.content: Alright, I get it now.|You’re interested in adventure.|Would you like to assist me with my research?

5.content: There are some mysterious limestone caves nearby.

6.content: I haven't explored them yet, but I have a hunch there are ancient ruins down there.

7.content: Here, I’ve got a hot-fix for your Mapz system.

8.content: |It won’t fix the| other issues with FeLine, but it should help you find the caves.

10.name: Palmerston
10.content: |...Ok, you might experience some discomfort for a moment.

12.name: Palmerston
12.content: |If you find anything interesting on your trip spelunking, please let me know.

13.content: Have fun,|@and please try to avoid annihilation

GlaciokarstBattleIncomplete.name: Palmerston
GlaciokarstBattleIncomplete.content: If you get hurt fighting some monster out there, I do not take any responsibility for your actions...

GlaciokarstBattleComplete.name: Palmerston
GlaciokarstBattleComplete.content: Wow. I really can't believe you defeated Norna and Wyrd so easily! I'm impressed.

battlecomplete_1.name: Feline
battlecomplete_1.content: We never mentioned that we defeated them... Palmerston, do you know something that we don't?

battlecomplete_3.name: Palmerston
battlecomplete_3.content: I'm conceerned by numerous reports of our citizens being antagonised by monsters. Events like these are happening all around the GeoRing.

battlecomplete_4.name: Palmerston
battlecomplete_4.content: ...I have a feeling that these monster attacks are connected.@You said that Norna told you to stay away from the desert?

battlecomplete_5.name: Palmerston
battlecomplete_5.content: Maybe it's time to take a trip out to the deserts to meet an associate of mine named Dr. Letharia. She lives on the edge of the desert. An area called XAPS.

battlecomplete_6.name: Palmerston
battlecomplete_6.content: She'll know what to do. I'll add Letharia's location to your FeLine Mapz system, and let her know you're on your way for a visit.
